DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate e-Health education program workplace contribute improve quality life Office Workers . And : Life style modification ; Improve physical activity Reduces Anthropometric Measures ; Reduces Pain discomfort musculoskeletal system
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The purpose study evaluate effectiveness e-Health education program workplace quality life promotion . Design : Double Blinded . Randomized clinical trial cluster . Setting : Office Workers Universidade Publica Estado da Bahia , Bahia State , Brazil . Participants : 348 office worker enrollment , sex , 18 year old . Intervention : Participants randomize : ( 1 ) reference group receive e-learning health education compose nine video-class accord dimension : 1 ) musculoskeletal health , 2 ) eat health e 3 ) mental health . A video available moodle platform every 20 day six month . In period worker monitor regard access video reinforcement remain program . ( 2 ) intervention group : receive e-health education program additional support healthcare tutor everyday .
